about_the_game:
A College of Thirst & Claws is an immersive, story-driven adult visual novel.

As a werewolf joining a supernatural college, you'll be thrown into the deep end of a sinister conspiracy in the town of Lanstone.

Develop relationships with beautiful women as you shape your own story.

You and your twin sister, Mika, spent your lives in a werewolf pack, where your father's the Alpha. Unfortunately, he harbours a deep hatred towards you and isolates you from the outside world.

When he abruptly forces you to leave and attend a unique college that helps supernatural beings mingle with humans, it seems the perfect opportunity to start a new life.

The plan was simple: mind your own business and never return to your pack. It would've been easy had you not aided a newly turned vampire. You've now found yourself in a sinister plot far beyond anything you anticipated.

Develop in-depth relationships with a cast of girls, including werewolves, vampires, mermaids and witches.

With the seven main love interests, will your connections be romantic or purely sexual?

Will you be hot-blooded and dominant or calm and analytical? Can you find the right balance?

Can you stay under the radar, or will your choices draw unwanted attention?

  • A character-driven story shaped by your choices.
  • Over 10,000 stunning images.
  • Detailed cinematics to enhance your experience.
  • A range of voice-acted sex scenes that will vary depending on your playstyle.
  • An evolving glossary to help you keep track of the characters and lore.
  • Original music and sound effects, designed for the story.
  • A sex scene replay gallery and image favouriting to revisit memorable moments.
  • A range of achievements and other unlockables.

content_descriptors.notes: This game depicts uncensored sexual content, use of alcohol, and violence.
